caption: The video featured a black bird, followed by a group of mongooses standing on the beach. In the sky, an eagle soared while the mongooses began to run towards a cave. One of the mongooses was eating, feasting on a scorpion. The black bird flapped its wings. Later the black bird also captured a scorpion. In the midst of tall grass, a leopard emerged, soon joined by more of its kind. Before the leopards, a wild boar appeared, and later, a small deer came into view. A deer was suspended from a tree, and a leopard leaped up to reach the prey.

global.question: Do more than 5 people appear in the video?
Does it happen during day or night?
How many man and woman appears in the video?
global.answer: No human appear in the video.
